data.persona: I guard the castle.  I guard the king.  I would kill to protect the royal family.
data.description:
You are in the Main house.
A fairly plain wooden building, the fireplace in the center of the back wall provides warmth during the winter seasons. There are paintings on the wall showing the farmer's forefathers and the previous owners. The floor is adorned with animal pelt rugs, and wood crafted furniture for the farmers to sit in.
There's some fresh dry house shoes, some little shoes with curved toes, a house key, and an oxygen tank here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing some boots, and wielding a spear and a shield.
data.goal: put spear on little shoes with curved toes

data.short_motivation: I want to see how durable the little shoes with curved toes are
data.mid_motivation: I would like to give the little shoes with curved toes to my son today
data.long_motivation: I want the shoes to last for many months
